member.name: T:DlhSoft.Properties.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Properties.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Properties.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: T:DlhSoft.Windows.Data.NodeManager
member.summary: Object collection management engine that uses a node collection to wrap the objects internally. Provides automatic management of indentation (node hierarchy) and expansion (node visibility) for the collection items. Use Items property to set your own node data item collection to manage and use Nodes property to access the managed node collection mapping your items. It is recommended to set at least these data member properties: IndentationMemberPath. These data member properties can also be set: IsExpandedMemberPath.

member.name: M:DlhSoft.Windows.Data.NodeManager.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the NodeManager class. The initial values of the data member properties are set to appropriate property paths for using NodeItem objects.

member.name: M:DlhSoft.Windows.Data.NodeManager.#ctor(DlhSoft.Windows.Data.DataManagementMode)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the NodeManager class. The initial values of the data member properties are set to appropriate property paths for using NodeItem objects.
member.param: Data management mode to use.

member.name: M:DlhSoft.Windows.Data.NodeManager.#ctor(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{DlhSoft.Windows.Data.SimpleNodeItem})
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the NodeManager class using simple data management mode.
member.param: Item definitions representing nodes to be initially added to the collection.

member.name: M:DlhSoft.Windows.Data.NodeManager.#ctor(DlhSoft.Windows.Data.Entity,DlhSoft.Windows.Data.DataManagementMode)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the NodeManager class. The initial values of the data member properties are set to appropriate property paths for using NodeItem objects.
member.param: Parent entity that owns the NodeManager or null if the manager has no parent entity.
Data management mode to use.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the NodeManager class using simple data management mode.
member.param: Parent entity that owns the NodeManager or null if the manager has no parent entity.
Item definitions representing nodes to be initially added to the collection.

member.name: M:DlhSoft.Windows.Data.NodeManager.#ctor(DlhSoft.Windows.Data.Entity,System.Collections.IEnumerable)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the NodeManager class. The initial values of the data member properties are set to appropriate property paths for using NodeItem objects.
member.param: Parent entity that owns the NodeManager or null if the manager has no parent entity.
Collection of node items to be managed.

member.name: M:DlhSoft.Windows.Data.NodeManager.#ctor(System.Collections.IEnumerable)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the NodeManager class. The initial values of the data member properties are set to appropriate property paths for using NodeItem objects.
member.param: Collection of node items to be managed.

member.name: M:DlhSoft.Windows.Data.NodeManager.#ctor(DlhSoft.Windows.Data.Entity,System.Collections.IEnumerable,System.String,System.String,DlhSoft.Windows.Data.EntityManager.Initialization,DlhSoft.Windows.Data.EntityManager.Initialization,DlhSoft.Windows.Data.DataManagementMode)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the NodeManager class.
member.param: Parent entity that owns the NodeManager or null if the manager has no parent entity.
Collection of node items to be managed.

Path to an Int32 value on the source node item to serve as the indentation level in the hierarchical collection, or null to indicate that the indentation level is not provided by the source node item.

Path to a Boolean value on the source node item to serve as the expansion indicator in the hierarchical collection, or null to indicate that the expansion indicator is not provided by the source node item.
A method to be called when the NodeManager initializes.
A method to be called when the NodeManager is disposed.
Data management mode to use.

member.name: M:DlhSoft.Windows.Data.NodeManager.#ctor(System.Collections.IEnumerable,System.String,System.String,DlhSoft.Windows.Data.EntityManager.Initialization,DlhSoft.Windows.Data.EntityManager.Initialization,DlhSoft.Windows.Data.DataManagementMode)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the NodeManager class.
member.param: Collection of node items to be managed.

Path to an Int32 value on the source node item to serve as the indentation level in the hierarchical collection, or null to indicate that the indentation level is not provided by the source node item.

Path to a Boolean value on the source node item to serve as the expansion indicator in the hierarchical collection, or null to indicate that the expansion indicator is not provided by the source node item.
A method to be called when the NodeManager initializes.
A method to be called when the NodeManager is disposed.
Data management mode to use.

member.summary: Gets the node that wraps the specified object from the internal node collection, or null if such node doesn't exist.
member.param: Wrapped object to search for.
member.returns: The node that wraps the specified object from the internal node collection, or null if such node doesn't exist.

member.summary: Gets the node at the specified index from the internal node collection.
member.param: The zero-based index of the node to be get.
member.returns: The node at the specified index from the internal node collection.

member.name: M:DlhSoft.Windows.Data.NodeManager.ExpandAll
member.summary: Expands all nodes of the internal node collection so that all child nodes become visible.

member.name: M:DlhSoft.Windows.Data.NodeManager.CollapseAll
member.summary: Collapses all nodes of the internal node collection so that all child nodes become invisible.

member.name: M:DlhSoft.Windows.Data.NodeManager.OnInitializeEntitiesCompleting(System.Int32,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{DlhSoft.Windows.Data.Entity})
member.summary: Executed when the managed nodes are initialized. The initial index of the nodes. The initialized nodes.

member.name: M:DlhSoft.Windows.Data.NodeManager.OnInitializeEntitiesCompleted
member.summary: Executed after the managed nodes are initialized.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Data.NodeManager.Nodes
member.summary: Gets the read-only node collection wrapping the objects that are currently managed. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Data.NodeManager.IndentationMemberPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to an Int32 value on the source node item to serve as the indentation level in the hierarchical collection, or null to indicate that the indentation level is not provided by the source node item. The hierarchy is based on the indentation level values of the nodes, so that a node with a lower index in the collection and having a specific indentation level will become the parent node for the nodes with a higher index in the collection and having an increased indentation level. It is recommended to set this property. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Data.NodeManager.IsExpandedMemberPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to a Boolean value on the source node item to serve as the expansion indicator in the hierarchical collection, or null to indicate that the expansion indicator is not provided by the source node item. If a parent node is expanded its child nodes become visible. If a parent node is collapsed its child nodes become invisible. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Data.NodeManager.RootNodes
member.summary: Gets the root nodes managed by this NodeManager. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Data.NodeManager.RootCount
member.summary: Gets the count of root nodes managed by this NodeManager. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Data.NodeManager.LeafNodes
member.summary: Gets the leaf nodes managed by this NodeManager. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Data.NodeManager.LeafCount
member.summary: Gets the count of leaf nodes managed by this NodeManager. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Data.NodeManager.Item(System.Object)
member.summary: Gets the node that wraps the specified object from the internal node collection, or null if such node doesn't exist.
member.param: Wrapped object to search for.
member.returns: The node that wraps the specified object from the internal node collection, or null if such node doesn't exist.

member.name: T:DlhSoft.Windows.Data.Node
member.summary: Represents a node item object wrapper generated and managed by a NodeManager, aware of its indentation in a hierarchical collection.

member.name: M:DlhSoft.Windows.Data.Node.#ctor(System.Object,System.String,System.String,DlhSoft.Windows.Data.Entity.Initialization,DlhSoft.Windows.Data.Entity.Initialization,DlhSoft.Windows.Data.Entity.Initialization,DlhSoft.Windows.Data.Entity.Initialization)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the Node class.
member.param: Source node item to be wrapped by the Node.

Path to an Int32 value on the source node item to serve as the indentation level in the hierarchical collection, or null to indicate that the indentation level is not provided by the source node item.

Path to a Boolean value on the source node item to serve as the expansion indicator in the hierarchical collection, or null to indicate that the expansion indicator is not provided by the source node item.
A method to be called when the initialization of the parent EntityManager is completed.
A method to be called when the Node is inserted into the parent collection.
A method to be called when the Node is removed from the parent collection.
A method to be called when the Node is disposed.

member.name: M:DlhSoft.Windows.Data.Node.#ctor(System.Object,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the Node class.
member.param: Source node item to be wrapped by the Node.

Path to an Int32 value on the source node item to serve as the indentation level in the hierarchical collection, or null to indicate that the indentation level is not provided by the source node item.

Path to a Boolean value on the source node item to serve as the expansion indicator in the hierarchical collection, or null to indicate that the expansion indicator is not provided by the source node item.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the Node class.
member.param: Node item to be wrapped by the Node.
A method to be called when the Node is inserted into the parent collection.

member.name: M:DlhSoft.Windows.Data.Node.Expand
member.summary: Expands this Node so that its child nodes become visible.

member.name: M:DlhSoft.Windows.Data.Node.ExpandBranch
member.summary: Expands the branch having this Node as root node so that all child nodes of the branch become visible.

member.name: M:DlhSoft.Windows.Data.Node.ExpandPath
member.summary: Expands the path to this Node so that all ancestor nodes become expanded to ensure this node becomes visible.

member.name: M:DlhSoft.Windows.Data.Node.Collapse
member.summary: Collapses this Node so its child nodes become invisible.

member.name: M:DlhSoft.Windows.Data.Node.CollapseBranch
member.summary: Collapses the branch having this Node as root node so that all child nodes of the branch become invisible.

member.name: M:DlhSoft.Windows.Data.Node.CollapsePath
member.summary: Collapses the path to this Node so that all ancestor nodes become closed to ensure this node and all its parents that have parents become invisible.

member.name: M:DlhSoft.Windows.Data.Node.ToggleIsExpanded
member.summary: Toggles the expansion for this Node so that if the node was collapsed it is expanded and if the node was expanded it is collapsed.

member.name: M:DlhSoft.Windows.Data.Node.OnFilteringVisibilityChanged
member.summary: Applies visibility changes when filtering visibility changes.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Data.Node.ParentCollection
member.summary: Gets the parent collection that owns this Node. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Data.Node.HasParent
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether this Node has a parent node in the collection based on indentation. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Data.Node.Parent
member.summary: Gets the parent node of this Node in the collection based on indentation. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Data.Node.HasChildren
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether this Node has any child nodes in the collection based on indentation. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Data.Node.Children
member.summary: Enumerates the child nodes of this Node in the collection based on indentation. This is a dependency property.

member.summary: Occurs when the parent changes for this Node.

member.summary: Occurs when the has parent property value changes for this Node.

member.name: E:DlhSoft.Windows.Data.Node.HasChildrenChanged
member.summary: Occurs when the has children property value changes for this Node.

member.summary: Occurs when the hierarchy is about to change at this Node.

member.name: E:DlhSoft.Windows.Data.Node.HierarchyChanged
member.summary: Occurs when the hierarchy changes at this Node.

member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the indentation for this Node can be increased.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Data.Node.CanDecreaseIndentation
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the indentation for this Node can be decreased.

member.summary: Gets or sets the expansion indicator of this Node. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Data.Node.IsExpansionEnabled
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether expansion is enabled for this node. This is a dependency property.

member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether this Node can be expanded.

member.name: T:DlhSoft.Windows.Data.Licensing.NodeManager
member.summary: Provides licensing utilities for NodeManager control.

member.name: M:DlhSoft.Windows.Data.Licensing.NodeManager.SetLicense(System.String)
member.summary: Predefines the license content to be considered for NodeManager component instances, at initialization time.
member.param: The XML content string of the license to be defined for this component type.

member.name: T:DlhSoft.Windows.Data.SimpleNodeItem
member.summary: Represents a simple node item that can be used as a data definition object when inserting or adding a Node using a NodeManager with simple data management mode. It is recommended to set at least these data properties: Indentation. These data properties can also be set: IsExpanded.

member.name: T:DlhSoft.Windows.Data.INodeItem
member.summary: Represents the interface of a node item aware of its indentation and expansion state (can be expanded or collapsed) that can be used as a source object to be wrapped within a Node and managed using a NodeManager or hosted within a hierarchical data management control.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Data.INodeItem.Indentation
member.summary: Gets or sets the indentation level of this INodeItem.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Data.INodeItem.IsExpanded
member.summary: Gets or sets the expansion indicator of this INodeItem.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Data.SimpleNodeItem.Indentation
member.summary: Gets or sets the indentation level of this SimpleNodeItem. The hierarchy is based on the indentation level values of the nodes, so that a node with a lower index in the collection and having a specific indentation level will become the parent node for the nodes with a higher index in the collection and having an increased indentation level. It is recommended to set this property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Data.SimpleNodeItem.IsExpanded
member.summary: Gets or sets the expansion indicator of this SimpleNodeItem. If a parent node is expanded its child nodes become visible. If a parent node is collapsed its child nodes become invisible.

member.name: T:DlhSoft.Windows.Data.ReadOnlyNodeCollection
member.summary: Read-only observable collection of Node objects.

member.name: M:DlhSoft.Windows.Data.ReadOnlyNodeCollection.#ctor(DlhSoft.Windows.Data.NodeCollection)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the ReadOnlyNodeCollection class.
member.param: Source node collection to be used by the new read-only node collection.

member.name: M:DlhSoft.Windows.Data.ReadOnlyNodeCollection.CreateNewItem(System.Object[])
member.summary: Called when a new node item is added to the collection by calling InsertNewItem method and the event handlers of the NewItem event haven't set up the new node item themselves.
member.param: List of parameters passed from InsertNewItem method used for actually creating the new node item.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Data.ReadOnlyNodeCollection.Item(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the node at the specified index.
member.param: The zero-based index of the node to get.
member.returns: The node at the specified index.

member.name: T:DlhSoft.Windows.Data.NodeItem
member.summary: Represents a node item aware of its indentation and expansion state (can be expanded or collapsed) that can be used as a source object to be wrapped within a Node and managed using a NodeManager or hosted within a hierarchical data management control. It is recommended to set at least these data properties: Indentation. These data properties can also be set: IsExpanded.

member.name: M:DlhSoft.Windows.Data.NodeItem.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the NodeItem class.

member.name: M:DlhSoft.Windows.Data.NodeItem.#ctor(System.Object,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the NodeItem class.
member.param: Content of this NodeItem.
Indentation level of this NodeItem.
Expansion indicator of this NodeItem.

member.name: F:DlhSoft.Windows.Data.NodeItem.IndentationProperty
member.summary: Identifies the Indentation dependency property.

member.name: F:DlhSoft.Windows.Data.NodeItem.IsExpandedProperty
member.summary: Identifies the IsExpanded dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Data.NodeItem.Indentation
member.summary: Gets or sets the indentation level of this NodeItem. The hierarchy is based on the indentation level values of the nodes, so that a node with a lower index in the collection and having a specific indentation level will become the parent node for the nodes with a higher index in the collection and having an increased indentation level. It is recommended to set this property. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Data.NodeItem.IsExpanded
member.summary: Gets or sets the expansion indicator of this NodeItem. If a parent node is expanded its child nodes become visible. If a parent node is collapsed its child nodes become invisible. This is a dependency property.

member.summary: Observable collection that owns Node objects used internally by a NodeManager.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the NodeCollection class.

member.summary: Gets the node that wraps the specified object, or null if such node doesn't exist.
member.param: Wrapped object to search for.
member.returns: The node that wraps the specified object, or null if such node doesn't exist.

member.name: M:DlhSoft.Windows.Data.NodeCollection.GetNodeAt(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the node at the specified index.
member.param: The zero-based index of the node to be get.
member.returns: The node at the specified index.

member.name: M:DlhSoft.Windows.Data.NodeCollection.ExpandAll
member.summary: Expands all nodes of the collection so that all child nodes become visible.

member.name: M:DlhSoft.Windows.Data.NodeCollection.CollapseAll
member.summary: Collapses all nodes of the collection so that all child nodes become invisible.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Data.NodeCollection.Item(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the node at the specified index.
member.param: The zero-based index of the node to be get.
member.returns: The node at the specified index.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Data.NodeCollection.ParentManager
member.summary: Gets the parent manager of this collection.
